Sports Towel (Hearts, M)
kDesc
A red sports towel with white hearts, worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
Une serviette de sport rouge ornée de cœurs blancs, à porter autour du cou pendant une promenade sans t-shirt.[#Legal]
Ein Sporthandtuch mit weißen Herzen, das man sich um den Hals legen kann, wenn man kein Hemd trägt.[#Legal]
Un asciugamano rosso a cuoricini bianchi, da portare avvolto attorno al collo quando si cammina a torso nudo.[#Legal]
Una toalla de deporte con corazones blancos que se coloca alrededor del cuello al pasear con el torso desnudo.[#Legal]
裸になった上半身の首にかけた、ハートが描かれた赤いスポーツタオル。[#Legal]
웃통을 벗은 상태에서 목에 걸친 하트가 그려진 붉은 스포츠 타올.[#Legal]
A red sport towel with heart prints draped around the neck when going shirtless.[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上、印有心形花圖案的紅色毛巾。[#Legal]
掛在赤裸上半身脖子上、印有心形花圖案的紅色毛巾。[#Legal]
A red sports towel with white hearts, worn around the neck while walking around shirtless.[#Legal]
